long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TransferChain Pass secures your passwords, helps you fill forms quickly, and keeps your data accessible.

You want to use different passwords for every website, but it can take effort to keep track of them all. With TransferChain Pass, you only ever need one recovery phrase. All your other passwords and important information go through client-side & end-to-end encryption, data fragmentation, and data distribution.

TransferChain Pass extension allows you to view, copy, and generate passwords, as well as save and autofill logins and forms while you browse the internet.

Log in to all your accounts on all your devices
- Store an unlimited number of logins in your password vault  
- Access your passwords and usernames anytime and anywhere you need them.
- Autofill the right logins on every site, every time
- Automatically sync your TransferChain Pass data across all devices, regardless of operating system differences.

Keep your information private
- TransferChain Pass protects your passwords with client-side and end-to-end encryption — with the highest standards in the industry (Please head to https://transferchain.io/security to learn more)
- We believe you should control your data. That’s why TransferChain’s architecture provides zero-knowledge encryption.


TransferChain Pass ensures your logins are secure, private, and easily accessible by you and only you.

For further details, please see our Privacy Policy (https://transferchain.io/privacypolicy) and Terms of Service (https://transferchain.io/termsofuse).
